file.name: forms-flow-forms-api-spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
x-stoplight:
  id: e3xsbb4b5h78y
info:
  title: forms-flow-forms API
  description: The API for forms-flow-forms.
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://{{baseurl}}'
  - url: 'http://localhost:3001'
components:
  securitySchemes:
    x-jwt-token:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
  schemas:
    Role:
      title: Role
      type: object
      description: Role model
      x-examples:
        example-1:
          tenantKey: string
          title: string
          description: string
          designer: true
      properties:
        tenantKey:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        designer:
          type: boolean
        _id:
          type: string
      required:
        - tenantKey
        - title
        - description
security:
  - bearerAuth: []
paths:
  /role:
    post:
      summary: ''
      operationId: post-role
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Role'
              examples:
                example-1:
                  value:
                    tenantKey: string
                    title: string
                    description: string
                    designer: true
                    _id: test123
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Role'
            examples:
              example-1:
                value:
                  tenantKey: string
                  title: string
                  description: string
                  designer: true
                  _id: '123'
    get:
      summary: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              examples:
                example-1:
                  value:
                    - _id: 1
                      machineName: formsflowReviewer
                    - _id: 2
                      machineName: administrator
                    - _id: 3
                      machineName: formsflowClient
                    - _id: 4
                      machineName: anonymous
  /user/login:
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Login to Form.io
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              examples:
                example-1:
                  value:
                    data:
                      email: test@test.com
                      password: test
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            X-Powered-By:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Express
            Vary:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Origin
            Access-Control-Allow-Origin:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: '*'
            Access-Control-Expose-Headers:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: x-jwt-token
            x-jwt-token:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyIjp7Il9pZCI6IjYyOGYwZWUyMTljZWJiOWNlYTRmMTJiMiJ9LCJmb3JtIjp7Il9pZCI6IjYyOGYwZWUwMTljZWJiOWNlYTRmMTIzZiJ9LCJpYXQiOjE2NTU4OTAyMTUsImV4cCI6MTY1NTkwNDYxNX0.4IEK2N7j9et_VyN2kTDrgb_IUz5ByY9LQgB_Twvs8vE
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json; charset=utf-8
            ETag:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: W/"119-cdOJti4LERpIYeSk+tU22e8fJ6Y"
            Date:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: 'Wed, 22 Jun 2022 09:30:15 GMT'
            Connection:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: keep-alive
            Keep-Alive:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: timeout=5
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              examples:
                example-1:
                  value:
                    _id: 628f0ee219cebb9cea4f12b2
                    form: 628f0ee019cebb9cea4f123f
                    owner: 628f0ee219cebb9cea4f12b2
                    roles:
                      - 628f0edf19cebb9cea4f1226
                    data:
                      email: test@test.com
                    access: []
                    externalIds: []
                    created: '2022-05-26T05:23:46.195Z'
                    modified: '2022-05-26T05:23:46.197Z'
  /form:
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Create a new form
      requestBody:

          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
